text: 8.5 Kis 25.40, Nam 8.4, Apo 7.44, Kol 2.17, Hib 9.23 Bɨ God nop sɨbogep okok lum awl mɨdɨl, God agnɨgep kal awl mɨgan ayaŋ mɨdɨl wog gɨpal. Pen kal awl anɨb ak, tap kawnan yokɨp tek mɨdeb. Kal yɨbɨl ak, God man ne alaŋ mɨdeb. Anɨb ak Mosis God agnɨgep sel kal ak gɨnɨg gaknɨŋ, God agak, Chɨl dum alaŋ mɨdɨl, nad sel kal yɨp ak gɨl, tap okok anɨb anɨb gɨl lɨnɨmɨn agɨl anɨb apin tek nep, mɨdupsek anɨgɨl gɨlɨtep gɨnɨmɨn agak.
